testcase.name: PMO Context API > GET /api/pmo-context/:projectId > should return PMO context with phase information
testcase.system-err: [ActivityService] Failed to log activity: SQLITE_CONSTRAINT: FOREIGN KEY constraint failed

testcase.name: PMO Context API > GET /api/pmo-context/:projectId > should return 404 for non-existent project
PMO Context API > GET /api/pmo-context/:projectId > should include allowed actions for current phase
PMO Context API > GET /api/pmo-context/:projectId > should include system messages based on phase
PMO Context API > GET /api/pmo-context/:projectId/task-labels > should return task labels with PMO relevance
